message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a tight budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider meeting me at $95?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $102. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $98, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider meeting me at $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $98. I can offer it to you for $107. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
